column16: For player ones, see Bond Level upgrades in next page --->

column4: Description
Known as the Emblem of Beginnings. Reads enemy's intentions in battle and responds with a flurry of strikes.
Known as the Emblem of the Holy War. Boasts high movement and powerful lance attacks.
Known as the Emblem of Echoes. Her holy magic is the bane of monsters.
Known as the Emblem of Dawn. Supports allies with illuminating magic and a healing staff.
Known as the Emblem of Binding. Endures enemy attacks and cuts a path through with his sword.
Known as the Emblem of Genealogy. A versatile knight proficient in axe, sword, and lance.
Known as the Emblem of Awakening. Creates bonds with allies, and pools their strength to attack enemies.
Known as the Emblem of Blazing. Defeats closeup foes with her sword and distant ones with her bow.
Known as the Emblem of Radiance. Destroys obstacles with his mighty sword and axe.
Known as the Emblem of the Academy. Wields various hero's relics and knows a variety of tactics.
Known as the Emblem of Fates. Can tap into dragon veins, a magic sleeping in the land.
Known as the Emblem of the Sacred. Her flashing sword shatters her foe's defenses.
Another Emblem of the Sacred. Pierces enemy lines with mighty lance techniques.
Known as the Fire Emblem. Grants the Divine Dragon's blessing and is the bane of the Fell Dragon.
Known as the Emblem of Beginnings. Reads enemy's intentions in battle and responds with a flurry of strikes.
Known as the Emblem of the Holy War. Boasts high movement and powerful lance attacks.
The Emblem contained within the Ring of the Princess Exalt, which was stolen from Lythos Castle.
The Emblem contained within the Ring of the Sage Lord, which was stolen from Lythos Castle.
The Emblem contained within the Ring of the Instructor, which was stolen from Lythos Castle.
The Emblem contained within the Ring of the Lady of the Plains, which was entrusted to Elusia.

Dark Emblem from Marth's realm. Embodies a mighty dragon who ruled through fear.
Dark Emblem from Sigurd's realm. Embodies a hateful god who struck terror into humans' hearts.
Dark Emblem from Celica's realm. Embodies a conqueror who was consumed by bloodlust.
Dark Emblem from Leif's realm. Embodies a bishop devoted to a dark faith.
Dark Emblem from Roy's realm. Embodies a dragon who tried to destroy humanity.
Dark Emblem from Lyn's realm. Embodies a seeker of forbidden knowledge who brings calamity.
Dark Emblem from Eirika's realm. Embodies a being who corrupted others with foul demonic powers.
Dark Emblem from Ike's realm. Embodies a tyrant who plunged his world into turmoil.
Dark Emblem from Micaiah's realm. Embodies a goddess who subjected humankind to harsh judgment.
Dark Emblem from Lucina's realm. Embodies a Fell Dragon who wrought despair and ruin.
Dark Emblem from Corrin's realm. Embodies a spiteful dragon who led many to destruction.
Dark Emblem from Byleth's realm. Embodies a king who massacred the children of a goddess.

Known as the Emblem of Rivals. Smashes her enemies to dust with skilled use of axes.
Known as the Emblem of Rivals. Nimbly strikes first and toys with foes with his skilled use of lances.
Known as the Emblem of Rivals. Outmaneuvers his foes with tricky tactics and skilled use of bows.
Known as the Emblem of Dragons. Has the ability to turn into a dragon and decimate foes with her breath.
Known as the Emblem of Strength. Wipes out enemies with his axe and risks his life for his friends.
Known as the Emblem of Acumen. Excels with magic and the use of powerful tomes.
Known as the Emblem of Revelation. Flies through the air and buries foes with her axe and tomes.
